name: Repairman's Hat
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Some Notum #L "Notum Fragment" "136624" or #L "Notum Chip" "136622" #L "Salesman's Hat" "205738" #L "Nano Programming Interface" "161699" #L "Inactive OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots" "164952" #L "Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool" "164558" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool + Salesman's Hat = #L "Transformed Salesman's Hat" "205741" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Nano Programming Interface + Inactive OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots = #L "Activated OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots" "164954" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Notum + Activated OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots = #L "Stabilized OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots" "164956" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Stabilized OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots + Transformed Salesman's Hat = #L "Repairman's Hat" "205743" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You can right-clic it to upgrad it up to QL50.
